queries.query:
INSERT INTO TB_DEPENDENTE_ISENTO( ID_DEPENDENTE, TP_ISENTO, CD_MES, CD_ANO, VL_ISENCAO, ID_CONTRATO,
USER_CREATED, DT_ALTERED, DT_CREATED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,
?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )

UPDATE TB_DEPENDENTE_ISENTO SET ID_DEPENDENTE = ?, TP_ISENTO = ?, CD_MES = ?, CD_ANO = ?, VL_ISENCAO = ?, ID_CONTRATO = ?,
USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?
